text:
Fix for #139

Make Client and Server parameter normalization consistent by moving the filtration of `oauth_signature` and `realm` arguments into `normalize_parameters()`, as specified by RFC5849, section 3.4.1.3.
title: Consistent Client and Server parameter normalization for OAuth1
Consistent Client and Server parameter normalization for OAuth1

text: Sorry for late reply. It would be awesome if you could modify server to only remove realm if given in the authorization header. The client is correct per spec atm, the fault lies in server param extraction/realm treatment.
Move the removal of oauth_signature and realm arguments into normalize parameters, as specified by RFC5849, section 3.4.1.3.
